content.detailedDescription: My husband, son and i were driving westbound on rte.30 in indiana. i saw a black object. my husband thought it might be a kite. i said no. it was moving around coming toward us. my son in the back seat on my side saw it too. it had just rained and when i first saw it, it was darker than the cloud. when it got above us i looked straight up and it appeared to have wing action.My 16 yr. old son asked what is it. i said i didn't know. when i first saw it in the distance it looked like there were two of them and the one just vanished. after a few minutes of watching it, it just vanished as if it went straight up,but fast. it was all black and in the shape of a human. no lights. no sound. it wasn't going in a ling. it was more moving fluently. it was dusk. just before it turned dark. light enough that somebody else had to see it. all you had to do is just look out your window. i just wonder if anyone else saw it. you couldn't miss it. i have no idea what it was. i'm 46 and i've never seen anything like it. i believe in god and ive always believed that he as well as demons are invisible.I've never believed in ufos but i don't know what we saw.It almost looked like it was wearing a cape. it was just flowing.When i looked straight up out the window i saw something that appeared to be wing action. it wasn't close enough to describe it fully. it was close enough that a lot more people should have seen it. my husband was driving and couldn't see it except at the start. my son and i watched until it vanished.
content.summary: looked lide the shape of a human but was flying. when i looked out the car window it appeared to have wing movement. it was all black

content.detailedDescription:
I was at a lake called lake garda, in burlington/farmington ct. with a friend. it's late around midnight when i see something out on the lake. hard to even focus on at first on the account of it being so dim. a few seconds later it begins to get a lot brighter, to the point where it is clearly clearly visible. then the object starts to move about, going right, left, up, and down. never moving in a circular motion, only at angles. it moved so fast at one point that it a created a red trail, or so my eyes perceived. then another astonishing movement, it disappeared then a few seconds later the object re-appeared about 50 feet away from its original point of origin. yet preceded to return to central point after every spasm. at first i thought it could just be some kids on the shore on the other side playing with some sort of light, but when i say it was hovering over the water, you could see the reflection on the water directly beneath the object. so i could put a perspective on where the object was placed, obviously not on shore. it was in front of all of the trees and bushes and looked quite large. the first thing that made me notice this was a weird kind of sound emanating from that direction. did not sound mechanical. it had more of a grunt. something sounded vocal. but not necessarily human. this happened once, and a sound was never heard again. what ended the confrontation was just a disappearance. it just stopped blinking and that was the end of it. i couldn't see a rough outline of maybe a solid object. this object was more ethereal. i take things like this very seriously, and am not hoaxing. the point of this report is for my own knowledge to see if anyone else in the area has seen anything similar.


thank you for your time,

patrick
content.summary: Red flashing orbe hovers 5 feet over lake and makes spiratic movements.

content.detailedDescription:
Back in the 70's when the weather would turn nice in the spring, a friend of mine who lived in the neighborhood and i would spend alot of time just walking around and talking about our lives in general. on one such night we were doing just that when we turned a corner and noticed what we at first thought was a large star hovering over the hill across the street from where we lived. after watching it for a few minutes we realized that it was no star -- it was too large and too close. as soon as we realized this fact the object suddenly changed into a football shaped orange light and began to move to what was our right until it was out of sight.

two weeks later we were out walking again and, turning the same corner, there it was again. and again it turned into an orange football ahaped light and slowly moved away to the right. 

a few weeks later i walked into chemistry class to find that another class had joined us in the room and we weren't going to be discussing chemistry that day. evidently, three of the teachers in our school had been involved in a pretty spectacular ufo sighting one morning while driving to work on rt. 16. they had reported the experience to mufon and had asked the field investigator to come to our school and talk to us.

near the end of his talk he mentioned that he had been out in our neighborhood recently looking to verify a report he was working on -- a bright star-like object that turned into an orange football shaped light!! i told him that i had seen it also but that he was too late in the evening--it was already gone by that time. then another boy in the class spoke up and said that he had also seen it -- he lived on the other side of the hill where we had seen it.
content.summary: Large star-like ufo that turned into orange football shape

content.detailedDescription:
My parents use to frequent this particular thrift store on the southside of chicago.  i remember this night like it was yesterday.  my mom, dad and my sisters went in the store.  my two brothers and i stayed outside and played a game of chase in the lot across the street.  i was the youngest of the two. probably around 7 or 8 yrs old.  now, had it not been for my two brothers to colaborate this story i would have wrote it off as a dream.  every now and then i confirm it with them. it seems that my parents weren't in the store very long which seems strange.  nevertheless,  the then long john silver restaurant was full of dinners. the parking lot was parallel to an alley wich was perpendicular to another alley forming a t-intersection.  we were interupted by a bright combination of lights which started at the end of the perpendicular alley.  it was flying like right at the top of the houses which are no more than two stories.  it was dead silent, cigar shaped with lights on the outer perimiter all the way around.  it seemed  to have had every color in the spectrum.  it slowly aproached us at the t-intersection.  it turned side ways right above the parallel alley and in front of us. i remember a long second and then it vanished before my vary eyes.  i've never seen anything move that fast then or since.  we looked at one another knowing what we all had experinced something unreal.  it seems imediatlly after that my parents exited the store. we looked at one another knowing what we all had experinced.  no one believes me when i tell my story.  after that i remember having weird dreams of climbing invisible stairs into the stary heavens and of being abducted by aliens.  my dreams are very vague now.  

when we moved to north carolina i would get the so called "stick".  like i'm being held down and when i would open my eyes there would be this huge unearthly head beside me where my brother's should be.  all those things have ceased.  that's not to say that they are related to the incident.  however, watching the program about metalic objects in the bodies of those who have witnessed sightings, caused me to remember an object in my right lower leg like right on top, slightly to the side of my shin.  it seems to move freely or slip away from my finger when i put pressure on it but for years has stayed in the same place.  i always wondered if i had, at some point in time, fell and injured myself allowing this to enter my leg, but there is no visible scar.  i remember being up at night investigating my leg and playing with it only to get irritated.  just tonite 06\21\08 i attempted to relocate it in my leg since i've not felt it in a while only to discover that it's still there playing the same tricks.  it's kind of sore when i press down on it now, maybe i'll get a magnet to check it out.  i have a sister who swears that she remembers being on a ufo being probed and stuff.  that, of course, was when we lived in garland, north carolina a very rural area.  i would be willing to go under hipnoces to get some closer.  i don't believe, i know they exist.  i don't beleve my parents beleived us.  even though i can still hear my dad say, "you think this is all god got?"  


sincerely 

lovie hunter
36 years old
content.summary: Ufo aproached me and two brothers stopped in front and above us citand the vanished in the heart of the city kedzie and 64th in the lot of long john silver now a burger king

content.detailedDescription: When they took me up to there ship it was very nice.They had drinks and food and six breasted alien girls serving my every whim.After plying me with much liquer.The cuter one...Extracted fluids from my body orally. say they would use it for cloning my superior body later creating a master race of me...Can you believe it..Any whey thats when ol six breasts told me she would need my legs but in return i would get hydrogen powered atomic legs...There super terrific so i just love aliens now.
content.summary: They wanted my legs but just got one arm

content.detailedDescription: A storm front is moving in here so i was looking to the east and saw a sphere shaped object about 30000 ft in altitude moving due east very slowly. it appeared to release a smaller sphere which flew north east very fast. the object then dissapeared from sight
content.summary: High altitude cruising orb movind due east

content.detailedDescription: I woke up at 2 o'clock in the morning, then i saw two lights on the sky. i first realize the two lights as helicopters, but when i looked at them a few moments, i couldn't exactly define it as human objects. later, i tried to identify which object they could be. when i looked at them closer, they blinked in an evenly way. i wanted to record the objects with a camera, but at first i didn't know exactly, if there are ufo's. in the end it was too late. they flew away and leaved a bright glimming veil on the sky. i didn't actually knot, if there were unknowing flying objects at all, but one thing i can say. if there weren't human produced flying objects, what else they can actually be?...
content.summary: Two undefinable lights on the sky

content.detailedDescription:
June 16 at 9:30 pm. i was looking out of the window from the second floor of my house.I was looking down at the pond when something caught my  attention from the corner of my eye.It was a very large brilliant light.This light was moving slow then stopped .Three other lights appeared behind it out of nowhere they looked like they were in a line formation.The lights would then disappear and reappear scattered but close together.They would move all directions up down left and right, then hover but, not all together. they  had no formation at this time.I then saw another light appear way up in the sky above the others,it then slowly moved down to the others.This maybe lasted a couple min.I then thought to get my video camera.I ran inside my house got my camcorder then started videotaping. i only got 20 seconds of video ,then they all vanished into thin air but i caught 3 on film just blinking out.Before i started videotaping i counted 5 of these things together .I dont know if you would call these things starlike or spheres.At times they looked like both. they seemed to be hovering and moving over a farm field area from what it looked like. 
my friend witnessed these too, he lives a half mile away from me.I don't know what these things are and i don't know whats going on around here in this greenwood area.This is the fifth strange sighting i have had since 2005.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Five bright lights vanishing and reappearing  moving different directions

content.detailedDescription: It was around 1 in the morning, i was on my phone in my driveway when i looked up and saw a object that at first glance appeared to be an aircraft, but after looking for a while, it was definately not an airplane of any kind. it was a triangular shaped object, a little off in the distance, but it still appeared to be huge in size. it made no sound whatsoever. none. i've never seen anything like it. the blinking lights (one in front and two bigger ones in back) were incredibly bright, so bright my eyes had to adjust and refocus every time they blinked, and i could follow its progress as it seemed to float away off into the distance for some ten minutes, untill the trees blocked it out. it had no red or green lights that an aircraft would have, just three extremely bright white lights. i was dumbfounded, and tried to grab the binoculars from indide the house but was unable to find them. again, it was nearly 1 in the morning, and i've never seen anything like it. i was neither tired nor under the influence of alcohol.
content.summary: Triangle,hovering, very bright lights, two in back one in front

content.detailedDescription:
Sighting background:  the witness reported her sighting to mufon via the cms on 5/20/2008, nearly thirty years after her close encounter.  her mother had phoned a local radio station on the night of the encounter and a newspaper reporter from the laconia citizen had interviewed her and other witnesses at the time of the sighting.  
nh state director peter geremia emailed me on 5/20/2008 and requested that i take the investigation assignment.  i agreed and received a formal assignment from mufon headquarters on 5/21/2008.  i phoned the witness on 5/23/2008 and scheduled an appointment to meet with her on 5/27/2008.  i drove the 86.4 miles from my home to hers and conducted and tape recorded a cognitive interview, followed by a period of interrogation.  then i drove the witness along the 13 mile route from ashland to her late parent���s former home in meredith, nh, while i conducted another tape recorded interview with her.  i also took six photos along the encounter route.  in all, i spent four hours with the witness.

sighting account:  in the late fall or early winter (oct.-jan)of 1978-1982, (the witness wasn���t certain of the date.), l-----, approximately 30 years old at the time and a female friend, m-----, along with l-----���s son (approximately 4-5 years old), were traveling between main street, ashland, nh and chemung road, meredith center, nh.  they left linda���s house at 6:00 pm for the twenty minute drive to her parents��� home where they intended to take part in a gospel singing gathering (her mother���s hobby).  l----- was driving. they proceeded west to exit 24 to i-93 south and planned to take the next exit, exit 23 to route 104 east to meredith center.  within a mile of their drive on 1-93 her friend���s eyes were drawn to a round light smaller than the size of the full moon, to the west in front of a mountain, possibly hammond hill. she pointed it out to l-----.  the witness described it as flashing orange, yellow and bluish lights. she described it as dancing all over, possibly putting on a show for them.  it rapidly ascended and descended vertically in front of and occasionally above the mountain.  it moved in a zigzagging pattern and rapidly bounced forward and receded back several times.  the larger craft hovered (now about the size of a silver dollar) and several (8 or more) smaller lighted objects ejected from it.  several cars pulled to the side of the road to observe the craft, but l----- continued to drive south on i-93.  she stated that she had the impression that it was following her.  

only five miles from l-----���s home she turned onto exit 23 (meredith-new hampton-new bristol) to take route 104 east.  she stated that a vehicle followed behind her on the ramp but quickly turned west toward bristol.  when l----- reached the top of the ramp, the huge, silent mushroom shaped craft, which she said was as large as a two lane highway, was inches above the road blocking her passage. on the domed top she observed multicolored lights.  below that was a single row of rectangular windows with oval edges.  an intense blinding fluid silvery light shone from the interior.  the lower part of the craft was cone shaped and three aluminum colored legs with a strange design on them were telescoping out from the bottom of the craft.  she didn���t remember whether or not the craft reflected light on the ground and didn���t recall any electromagnetic interference.

needless to say, the three witnesses were frightened.  l---- stated that she yelled, ���no way! what the hell am i doing?  i���m getting out of here.���, and attempted to accelerate around the craft.  her young son, according to the witness was crying and lying on the back seat floor.  the witness does not recall passing the craft or turning left toward meredith.  she had no continuous memory of what came next.  as if no time had passed, her next memory was of driving on the northbound ramp exit 23 on the opposite side of i-93.  her son was no longer crying.  shaken, she pulled into a garage on the north side of route 104 owned by mr. (anonymous), whom she knew.  she described her emotional state as laughing, crying, scared and excited. 

there were several men in the garage and she asked them to join her outside to assure her she wasn���t seeing what she thought she was seeing.  they all observed a boomerang shaped craft that was up on its side between the garage and the trees adjacent to the garage.  she couldn���t estimate its size but said that it was almost as long as the garage in height.  there was a pattern on the craft that she couldn���t reproduce exactly.  the silent object moved slowly behind the garage.  orange and yellow steady lights lined the front edge of the boomerang.  

the witness and her friend returned to her car and proceeded east on route 104.  they observed the craft which seemed to pace her vehicle 

the witness stated that when they arrived at their destination they were excited, happy and scared.  her son, who was normally outgoing and active, sat quietly on the couch.  the witness���s father went outside to attempt to observe the craft but it was no longer in sight.  the gospel singers had completed their practice and were preparing to leave. the witness guessed that she arrived at her parents��� home least an hour later than expected.  

the witness���s eyes were burning pressure and pain about a week later.  both witnesses would occasionally experience this strange tingling between their eyebrows, which signaled them that a ufo was nearby.  they drove to the sensed location and observed ufos on several occasions. they saw a light (like the one on i-93 and the boomerang) moving above the lake.  it was never as large as the ones in their first sighting.  orange, white, blue and maybe green.  they could go up, down, sideways, zigzagging, moved away at an incredibly fast rate, almost as if it had turned its lights out.  

the witness stated that she and her friend often experienced a tingling sensation between their eyebrows after the ufo encounter and ���sensed��� that they should drive to a designated location to observe a ufo.  they complied with this sensory input and observed what she described as 20-30 ufo sightings over a two year period.  on one occasion her mother videotaped the ufo but her grandmother accidently taped over it, she stated.

at night she sometimes would feel this sensation like they���re coming and felt that they were coming before she went to bed at night.���  she felt that they could come through walls.  witness reported that she hadn���t read any books and had never heard that they could pass through walls.  she recalls the sensation of someone in her bedroom but does not recall observing anyone.  she said it was the feeling of getting a physical from a doctor.  she could see shadows a lot of big black eyes all around her and touching her.  she felt like she was suspended in the air.  she would feel like she didn���t like it and wanted to go back home. this would frighten her and she would remain awake for a while.  she would have these flashes of memory when she woke up in the morning.  she has considered hypnosis and stated that she would like to know, but at the same time doesn���t want to know.  

the witness���s friend m----- remarried and moved to england.  i have emailed an inquiry to her but have not received a reply.  l----- informed me that m----- intends to respond to my inquiry, so i am waiting to hear from her.

the garage owner refuses to discuss his ufo observation.  he suffered criticism and humiliation following the newspaper publicity and wants to ���forget about it.��� additionally, he is caring for his aged wife and wants to be left alone.  

i traveled to laconia, nh���s library and spent the day researching its newspaper archives for september 15, 1978-march 31, 1979 and september 15, 1979-march 31, 1980.  it was a 150 mile round trip journey.  i wasn���t able to locate the ufo sighting report.   

i have researched the mufon, nuforc and nicap archives and have not been able to locate this sighting report. my investigation is temporarily on hold until i receive more precise information from the witness or a reply from her friend in england.
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Two witnesses observed a mother ship releasing smaller objects followed by a close encounter and translocation.

content.detailedDescription:
i was at my friends house waiting on him to come home. it was sept 10th or so at 3:00 am or so, it was a friday . he was a musician and got off work about 2:00 in the morning. i was sitting on the hood of my car eating a pack of m&m's looking down this road i had lived on for 3 years or so (i lived there from about 11 to 14 years old and had spent many nights walking this street. in those days it was not dangerous.)i had just gotten my drivers licence at 15 ( a hardship licence ) i was looking at what i thought was an arial antena light that i thought must surely have just been installed. but it looked strange the light was kind of big for an arial light and the light did not glow. you know streams of light from the light. it was about 1 and 1/4 a mile and a few feet from me.
  as i looked i thought i'm going to get closer to it and while still looking at it i started to move off the hood of my car. as i slid to the edge of the hood it started moving slowly and smoothly to the left of my position. at that point still looking at it i kind of freaked and jumped off the hood when i did it started moving just a little faster.
  at first i just stared at it for a minute. then for some unknown reason to me i decided to follow it. i guess being 15 years old and somewhat wild in nature i did not realize that it could have been dangerous. it was not. that side of town was set up in a large rectangular grid. from 61st to 66th the streets were and are about 2 miles long, at one end the cross street is west port arthur road. at the other is jade rd. the sreet crossing in the middle is garnet ave i believe. i was sitting on 65th facing jade in between west port arthur and garnet. almost dirrectly center between the two roads.
  as i took off following it, it went towards 64th on my left. i went down to jade and turned left, i saw it slowly moving passed 64th and 63rd and then it went below the trees. i drove down and turned left down 63rd. then left on garnet then left again on 64th. i saw it again then and it flew kind of in a circle ( not exactly but it vered around me.) when it came around again it went below the trees and came up closer to me.
  at that point i got the distinct feeling it was playing hide and seek with me. it flew up a little higher and flew west toward dick dowling elementary school. i followed it out there and lost contact or my visual of it. i was on the road next to the school, the south side. i got out of my car and stood on the running board with one elbow on the roof and one elbow on the top of the door and i looked around in the sky for a while, a minute anyway. 
  i looked right above me and about 2 to 3 miles straight above me it was just sitting in the sky. as i stared it, it just took off west at what can only be light speed. it disapeared not behind anything, but in about 1 second it went so fast in that direction it got to small for me to see and left me looking around for it, for about 7 or 8 seconds. then it came back from exactly the opposite direction, or like it had went around the earth once and stopped at the same spot exactly. and when it stopped it had no wobble, like you might expect something moving that fast to have when it stopped. 
  it scared me at that point and i took off. but i was not the kind of kid that scared easy. and as you might imagine no one believed me. my brother said it might have been something nasa was working with, (nasa was only about 100 miles away in houston.) and the reason we don't see it in the papers is it is secret or it is just to expensive to run. but i do not believe what i saw was man made. and if it is a man made craft i can tell you now that man and probably woman have been out of this solor system and probably at least fairly deep into this galaxy. and maybe way out of this galaxy.
 it was not man made, it was to small for a man in the first place and if it was remote control our technology is very advanced. much more than anything the common man can imagine. reguardless of where the technology  comes from, again i think it was alien made and alien run.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Foo fighter type, about 3 to 4 ft. in diameter, orange light, no light beems coming off of it.

content.detailedDescription:
About 11:45a, on my way home from coming from my bank, while driving down univ. ave. @ 30th st. and boundary st., i was prompted mentally to look up to the sky. (it was a very clear and warm day.) to my amazement, i saw a large, onyx-color, trianglular ufo in the southeastern sky (just over the cities of san diego/national city/chula vista and the 32nd st. naval base.
  
the object was vertically stationery throughout viewing, with occasional twisting motions (left-to-right) of the object. the object's triangular shape had rounded edges, with a luminescent inner layer, and a see-through "sky" core. it was really high in the sky, and i made sure i knew it wasn't a helicopter, plane, hot-air balloon. there were no propellers, wings, flames, basket... nothing. just a blackish, triangular, almost diamond-shaped object. 

i immediately pulled over to the curb and put my emergency flashers on. i began to take two pixs on my cell phone camera while still in my car. however, i could not see the object, so i had to snap the shots in the general direction of where i was seeing this object. it took me about 10 minutes. it was hard to see at times because of the glare of sunlight. 

preparing to take the next two pixs, i took my glasses off (which are translucent glasses--changes to uv tint when outdoors) so i could see the object more clearly. to my surprise, i could not see the object at all, only the clear-blue sky. when i put my tinted glasses back on, i saw it clearly visible. what i found was that it was not visible with the naked eyes, only visible when wearing my tinted uv glasses. immediately, i got the sense it knew i was watching it and taking the pixs, and suddently the object vanished--not flew away! i was excited by the event and it stayed on my mind aftwards for about 2 hours. i then went home and decided to draw what it was. i struggled with it, because i noticed it appeared to shape-shift. from diamond-like to triangular to twisting and turning.

ironically, the naval base was near its vicinity. the fact that there were no jets dispatched, led me to believe it had cloaked itself--if i couldn't see it with my naked eyes, only when i had my tinted glasses on, i imagine it wasn't making itself obvious to anything else. however, this object was of significant size. wow, what an experience!!
content.summary: I saw a large, onyx-color, trianglular ufo in the southeastern sky (just over the national city/chula vista/north island naval base areas.

content.detailedDescription:
My daughter was sitting at the computer. our front door was open due to the warm weather. she looked out the doorway and noticed something falling from the sky. at first she thought it was a shooting star, but it lasted far too long. she then said "do you see that" and pointed at the sky through the door. my husband then looked and saw the object. his comment was that it looked like the moon was falling. my daughter said it first flashed green lights, then glowed red like a meteor enterring the atmoshpere, then it smoked, then it glowed geen again, then fireballed. it finally dropped down between two trees to the northwest of our house. the object was so large that she expected to hear or feel a large boom when it actually landed, but we didn't hear or feel anything.

did anyone else report this sighting? we do live to the southeast of camp pendleton, but have never seen anything like this.

if you could please let us know if anyone else reported anything, we'd appreciate it. thanks
content.summary: Falling large object , meteor like, but flashing lights

content.detailedDescription: as i left my job at 2:30 am and drove west on arbutus ave i looked ahead        toward the manistique river.I noticed a large round object above the river. having worked here for 22 years(27 years now) i have made this drive thousands of times.When i noticed the object, i said to myself out loud "look at the moon,it looks like its sitting on top of the trees"  as i got closer i realized that the moon should have been more directly above me and  it definately wasnt the moon.The craft hoovered above the river and as i got closer it ducked behind the trees. i moved up the road and it peaked back above the trees and then went out of sight for the last time. i blew through two stop signs and drove behind the trees searching for the object but it was nowhere to be found.I drove the route 6 or 8 times to see if i had been mistaken and had seen something else,but there was nothing there.  i was so mesmerized by what i saw i really couldnt believe what had just happened. it was a round disc that was about 100 to 150 feet in diameter,and seemed to be lit from a scourse of light shining on it more than a light from within the object.It had 2 circles paralell to each other about 1/5th of the distance from the edge of the craft to the center of the craft, with various shapes which reminded me of hiroglyphics (sp?). this occurence has left me quite shaken and i have told very few people. the manistique river has been a super fund pcb clean-up site and info on this is available on the epa website. this clean-up was supposed to take a year or so to complete, but the job lasted 4 or 5 years. even today when i think about this event, i shake as a nasty chill goes throughout my entire body. there was no noise coming from the object.I believe it was checking the outcome of the clean-up operation. i hope to be hypnotized so as to go back to get  more info from my memory and maybe understand better what exactly  it was that i saw.
content.summary: Large object   hoovering  above the manistique river, located in the beautiful upper penninsula of michigan.

content.detailedDescription: This comet-like bright object moved across the western sky near sunset. the extremely bright object was moving very quickly and seemed rather large. it was so bright that it appeared white hot. it had the appearance of having a short comet like tail. it traveled from south to north rather low above the western horizon (which for me was a group of trees that line my neighbors property and our street). i watched it for about 5 mins trying to figure out what it was. it was traveling at a good clip. so i ran in a grabbed my camera. i came back and filmed it for a few minutes. when i look at the film on my computer, it is almost impossible to see the sky was so bright. but i was able to save a couple of stills from the film and adjust them so it is easier to see.
content.summary: Extremely bright fireball

content.detailedDescription: 1989 7:30p.M. my son and i were driving south on keatonville road  returning home from visiting my cousins.I pulled to the side of the road and stopped to light a cigarette.After doing so,i noticed some strange looking lights in the sky very near us.My son and i then observed two brightly colored orbs of light.One blue-one red.They seemed to be going into and out of a small cloud.Visible one moment,and obstructed the next.That's when we saw it.We watched in shock and disbelief as the disc shaped craft emerged from the small cloud and silently and swiftly ascended to less than fifty yards from our car.It continued to slowly move to about thirty yards from us.They were close enough for me to see them looking at us through windows.They seemed to be somewhat small from that distance.Sudden fear overcame me and i remeber attempting to drive off as fast as i could.Then next thing we remember is we are still in the car the cigarette has burned up in the ashtray,the car is not running now,and we are sitting slumped over in the seats.I looked up and watched the craft leave the area.I started the car and we drove home as fast as we could.We both felt like we had been asleep or drugged or hipnotised.We checked in with my cousin upon returning home.He confirmed our hunch about the missing  time at least thirty minutes,maybe forty five minutes were missing not to mention the cigarette i didn't get to smoke.Three days later i removed from my own finger a triangle shaped object that looked semi transparent like silicone but it was harder than a rock.The object was a little smaller in size than a b.B.Back to the craft - it seemed to float unaffected by earths gravity.When it left,it moved off slowly at first then accelerated at so fast that it seemed to vanish.There were no clouds in the sky that night except for the one it came out of.Visibility was very good.We had a close encounter of the third or possibly the fourth kind.I went from skeptical to a absolute believer in the first five to ten seconds of the close up visual of the craft with the litte beings peering at us.You would to.We decided we didn't talk about it outside of each other for fear people would not be able to believe the truth.I am getting older now and i think it's time to tell the truth...God be with us-all...
content.summary: Disc with ring of windows around center.Aliens looking at us,as we looked back at them.

content.detailedDescription:
I am a truck driver from dallas. i had finished making a delivery at the walmart distribution center in los lunas,nm. i parked my truck in a dirt lot behind a walmart store. i was sitting in the drivers seat completing my log book when i saw thw object in front and above me. i was looking west.It was about 8 pm mountain daylight time and the sun was setting , almost below the horizon. the sky was still very light and free of clouds.It was very bright , like a full moon , but there were no other stars in the sky that were visible because it was still too light out. the object was round like a sphere or circle and it was stationary.I watched it for almost two hours. it appeared to be slowly gaining altitude as the sun went down and eventually got so high all i could see was a faded glow. by this time stars were vivible everywhere.
i called my brother on my cell phone and told him what i was looking at and he told me that i was looking at a weather balloon. i thought about that and came to the conclusion that a weather balloon would float with the jet stream and or the trade winds , yet this object was stationary.I watched it for so long that i noticed that visible stars had changed position as the earth rotated , but yet this object was stationary.I really don't know what it was.
i have an extensive backround in aviation and i am positive it was not a man made aircraft.I was a aviation electricians mate in the navy back in the eighties and a avionics technician working on commercial jets. i have about seventeen years experience with aircraft before i started driving a truck.
i have pictures taken with a q9 motorola cell phone and three video clips taken with the same phone.
content.summary: Very bright and stationary

content.detailedDescription: It was amazing,,crazy i was on the beach when all of a sudden..Heyyy is that a penny .... ohhh it is a penny....Hmmm with the other six cents in my pocket this makes eight.Ooohhhhh yeah the ufo...It was incredible i was on the ...Oh my god ..I just saw my reflection in the mirror...Im amazing....Ohhh company is here...Later
content.summary: Big witnessed sighting over lake    incredible

content.detailedDescription: I was playing outside and i heard a weird hovering sound isaw a couple ufo go by thats when i went inside to show my mom. after i showed my mom iwent outside for about a hour and saw 13 more ufos
content.summary: I saw 15 ufo 2 dissapered when i grabbed my camera

content.detailedDescription: i was practicing my guitar in a park. i looked up at a small propeller airplane. i saw another object above it that looked way higher in the sky. i thought it was just an airplane so high up that i could not make out its shape. it looked round, silvery and spherical. i thought that was just because it was so high that i could not make it out. it also appeared not to be moving very much if at all, but again i thought that was because it was so incredibly high in the sky. i continued to look at it wondering if it was moving. it then just seemed to vanish. it was kind of small in the sky, but it definitely went out of view. i kept looking at the sky where it was and could see nothing. there were no clouds at all in that part of the sky. not even close to that part of the sky. i was wondering if there were any other sightings over salt lake that day. i don't know if i even believe in ufo's or not. but i just thought it strange that it could just go out of sight like that. i did not think a lot about it, just that it was odd. i wondered if my eyes were just playing tricks on me, or if it just went higher and out of view. i was definitely looking at it when it went out of view, and could not see it again.
content.summary: Object in sky that disappeared. way high in sky. looked silver sphere like. thought it was a plane. not moving fast if at all.

content.detailedDescription: Object observed when i awoke in the middle of night for the toilet, then went into consevatory noticed clock was 2.10am location as above kilmarnock ayrshire, conditins very clear calm night sky.. going throuh kitchen prior to entring conservatory...Main large orange/white diamond hovering moving slighty left right 4 off very bright orange/white diamond lights protruding from north south east west direction joining up to main diamond once formed full diamond & attached lights hovered for a minute then accelarated almost instantley off into horizon.
content.summary: Orange/white diamond 4 off brightorange /white diamond lights protruding from nsew direction joining up to main diamond

content.detailedDescription: I started taking pictures as it got dark and there were orbs in the pictures.  later that night after the moon was full i noticed a very bright light next to the moon.  it looked like the same object that i had been seing the last couple of nights.  i took over 700 pictures of this object changing shape in front of the moon.  there were other objects that did the same thing as this onject in other parts of the sky and i have pictures of them doing the same thing.  changing shaopes like a electric tape worm.  the objects were still there at 4:30 am and probably stayed until daybreak.
content.summary: Ufo in front of the moon in wichita, ks

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving west on parmer lane around 8:15 - 8:30 a.M., i saw a round object that seemed to be floating, but heading north/north east.  it did seem to control it's own destination.  at one point it turned and appeared to have a red metallic color.  

i called my husband but by the time he could get outside and see the object, it was so far away it just looked like a little black dot.
content.summary: Shape-shifting, round or oblong, metallic no wings or propellers

content.detailedDescription:
In long beach, on top of signal hill, june 19, 2008 at around 10:30 pm i was watching what i thought to be a satellite move across the sky from the west to the east.  it was about 80 degrees off the horizon, and about the brightness of -2. suddenly it came to a halt.  then it started to move forward slowly, but was zig-zagging from left to right and back to left again.  then another bright object that had been stationary, we thought was a star, jetted away from the zig-zagging object moving toward the west, and came to a halt.  the other bright object that had been doing the zig-zagging then moved out on a straight course eastward bound. then, the bright object that had before been stationary kept moving in the sky, in a small circle, then moving in a short distance to toward the north and then back a short distance to south, then make another circle, then halt, and then repeat the pattern. this went on until i grew tired and left. 
before leaving, i spotted another bright object, similar also to what a bright satellite would look like, flying from the west toward the east.  as this passed very near to the object making circles and other moves, that object moved off fast toward the south as to give the eastern bound object a lot of room.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright ufo's in low earth orbit can be seen doing various moves in the dark sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was located in belgium, a couple of miles south of antwerp. i always go outside the house to smoke and that evening was no different. when it's dark, most of the time i gaze at the sky, especially when it's a clear sky like that day. (there were some clouds, but only a few randomly scattered).

so, while smoking a cigarette outside, around 23:50pm on thursday 12 june 2008, i saw a formation of a dozen ufo's going from south to north. i'm by no means an aviation expert or anything like this (i'm a systems programmer), but i would estimate they were flying at cloud level (2km, 6000 feet). it was a very clear sky with a couple of small clouds.

the ufo's were flying in 3 close v shaped formations, like this:

  o   o   o  
 o o o o o o

(i hope the above ascii 'picture' does not get scrambled)

it was very fast and i think i remember seeing more than the 9 in that strict formation, there might have been 1-3 extra ufo's not in this tight formation but very close by. the ufo's seemed to exhibit slightly irratic lateral movement as they were going forwards. 

as for the shape, they all looked identical to each other and very closely resembled the shape of the boeing x45 uav, except for 2 things:

1) the wings were not swept backwards, but were perfect perpendicular to the fuselage, also the wings seemed more slim and longer and ended in a point (triangle as wing). (very similar the the u2 spyplane wings, except again, they ended in a point, forming a triangle as a wing, not a trapezoid).

2) the ufo appeared as 100% light (meaning that i could see no 'physical' structure). this was not bright white light, but a golden/yellow/orange fire-like light. the fuselage was brighter lit than the wings.


they travelled very fast, i never saw anything moving that fast before, crossing half of the sky in 2-3 seconds. i did not hear any sound.

ofcourse i can't give you any definite numbers like, how high they were flying, how fast and how big the ufo's were or if it's a secret military vehicle made by us, or an off-world vehicle.

all i can say, that it looked to me they were flying at cloud-level, they were not larger than aircraft we know commonly, they traveled very fast, they were essentially light and they emitted no sound.

when this all happened, i did not 'feel' anything strange as in scared or very happy. all i felt like, and i did say it out loud, was "wtf?" (i uttered the words, not the acronym).
content.summary: Formation of a dozen ufo's crossing the sky in 2-3 seconds.

content.detailedDescription:
My 12-year-old daughter was up talking on phone to friend looking out her bedroom window (facing south) at the moon when a red-glowing pulsing craft came into view instantly (in the blink of an eye) to the right out bedroom window over a wooded valley in front of our house.  it had a row of white lights along lower edge that raced one at a time to the right, then traveled back again, repeating. the whole craft glowed red that got brighter then dimmer.  it moved slowly just above the tree line until it was directly in front of her window where it hovered silently (moving slightly, not stationary) for several more seconds.  it did this light show several times before moving off quickly to the east.  her boyfriend on the phone told her as she described it that it must be a ufo because planes etc., don't do that. he then looked out his own window (about 5 miles away)in our direction and said he saw 7 red dots all traveling in a group, got scared and ducked.

note:  we've joked that our row of solar led garden lights (photo attached) that randomly pulse colors of green, red, blue that are lining our garden wall in a half circle about 25-30 feet in length might signal a ufo-- like they might think one of theirs is in distress...  perhaps it works!  we're considering setting up a motion camera to catch one on film...

within the last couple of years we've also seen nighttime neon green flash-type anomalies on two separate occasions-both lit up the sky bright green & one looked like it should have crashed, but there was no sound & no reports on the police scanner.
content.summary: Red pulsing classic shaped ufo w/white lights

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work down a road to my house and i looked up to the left and saw a very bright light, too bright to be an airplane. i continued down the road and it started moving down very fast and 4 distinct lights appeared on the corners in the shape of a diamond. i kept watching it until it disappeared behind the treeline, and then watched it move back up. i was very excited to see this because i have been following ufo cases for 3 years now and i finally get to see one.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Diamond shaped, 4 lights,

content.detailedDescription: I was riding in the car with my parents, and i looked up a saw a very bright star.I saw it move in one direction(north),which was the way our car was driving.I simply dismissed it, and thought i saw it move through the car window, becuase we were driving that way.But when i got home i went to my backporch(which was west), and looked for the object. i found the object in the sky.I watched it for 30 minutes.All it really did was moved around very swiftly.Then it spun around in a circle very fastly.Then it accelerated to a point at which it made one strip of light and disapeared.
content.summary: It was a very big star-like craft, that was very, very bright.

content.detailedDescription: My husband was in the air force and was picking me up from work. we stopped in our car and so did many other cars. we stopped to stare at for more than 15 minutes. we were very young and didn't know quite what we were looking at. we never got out of our car. we were somewhat scared but were transfixed by the sight of it. it was awesome looking. it never made a sound and we had our windows open. the next day my husband heard a lot of talk about it being near one of the missle sites.We eventually drove on home, but we never forgot the sight of it to this day. it seems like it was yesterday. we know it was a ufo. no doubt about it. we have never had a doubt about it ever since. we first noticed it because it was hoving right over the main thoroughfare. approx. 150-200 ft. in the air. you would have almost had to have been blind not to notice it.
content.summary: Ufo was visiting whiteman afb, but we saw it in the middle of the day

content.detailedDescription: We live on a hill above factoria and i was looking out our window as i worked out on my stairmaster and saw a large triangular shaped yellow/orange object hovering over the west end of the east channel bridge.  i thought it was a huge kite but, as i watched, it rose straight up then moved at about a 30 degree angle to the n.W. after it came 40 or 50 spherical silver/gray objects which appeared to just cascade up into the sky behind it.  among the silver balls were two larger spheres which were smaller in size than the triangle but larger than the other balls.  these were dark red in color. these spheres stayed more stationary while slowly rising into the air and heading nw. this morning, i tried to compare their size to the semi trucks which i can see on the bridge.  the large triangle would have been at least 5 semi trucks wide and the smaller balls about 2 semis in width and the red balls about 2 and 1/2 semis in width.  i kind of hope these were balloons but their  size was so large.  if these are from another planet, they are not very concerned about showing themselves.  i felt neither frightened nor compelled to run for my camera, just kind of stunned. they just rose out of site above the windows edge and i didn't even go outside to watch how they went away.  this is very unlike me.  i  called my husband who also watched them and now does not want to talk about it. he will just say "we saw some ufo's". i am a college educated rn and my husband was editor of the chicago tribune and an editor for the detroit free press for over 20 yrs.  did anyone else see this or know what it was?
content.summary: Ufo's over  west end of east channel bridge
